message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $16,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still aiming to keep the cost within my budget. Could we possibly agree on a price of $17,000?
